allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
security: Remove exposed credentials and add frontend/convex for Vercel

- Deleted temp_key.txt \(private key\)
- Removed hardcoded env vars from frontend/vercel.json
- Added frontend/convex/ for Vercel deployment \(fixes build error\)
- Enhanced .gitignore to prevent future credential leaks

IMPORTANT: Rotate these exposed credentials:
- Supabase anon key \(in vercel.json history\)
- Any keys in config.py, debug_embeddings.py, modal_video_processor.py

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Update convex imports to use @convex alias for Vercel build

Changed relative imports \(../../../convex/\) to alias imports \(@convex/\)
to work with the frontend/convex folder structure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
